description: stemmed goblet with wide foot; conical shaped at top; engraved scrolls and text (in Latin?) on conical section; domed cover with similar engraved scrolls and text in block letters; organic knob; clear glass
marks: Signature and Date on bulbous section of stem, engraved: [Willem Van
text: As an outstanding example of glass from the Dutch Golden Age, this signed and dated masterpiece by one of the three foremost Netherlandish glass calligraphers of the seventeenth-century significantly adds to the MIA’s collection of Dutch art of the 17th century.
title: Goblet and cover
